meta.description: Optimize the selection of feed to meet nutritional requirements at minimum cost.

params.name: protein_content
params.description: Protein content per gram of each feed

params.name: mineral_content
params.description: Mineral content per gram of each feed

params.name: vitamin_content
params.description: Vitamin content per milligram of each feed

params.name: price_per_kg
params.description: Price per kilogram of each feed

vars.name: amount
vars.description: Amount of each feed in grams

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(price_per_kg[f] * amount[f] / 1000 for f in FEEDS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of feed

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein_content['1'] * amount['1'], protein_content['2'] * amount['2'], protein_content['3'] * amount['3'], protein_content['4'] * amount['4'], protein_content['5'] * amount['5'])

constraints.name: mineral_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(mineral_content['1'] * amount['1'], mineral_content['2'] * amount['2'], mineral_content['3'] * amount['3'], mineral_content['4'] * amount['4'], mineral_content['5'] * amount['5'])

constraints.name: vitamin_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(vitamin_content['1'] * amount['1'], vitamin_content['2'] * amount['2'], vitamin_content['3'] * amount['3'], vitamin_content['4'] * amount['4'], vitamin_content['5'] * amount['5'])
